snippet.title: Mega Man X Legacy Collection 1+2 Announce Trailer
snippet.description: Get ready to roll out, Maverick hunters! Mega Man X Legacy Collection 1 and 2 are coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC July 24th! http://bit.ly/MMXLC
